ygData.subject: Re: Disarm?
ygData.msgSnippet: It is a useless skill.  When you disarm the weapon leaves their hand and lands on the ground for anybody to loot.  You can only disarm non magic weapons.  And
ygData.messageBody:
It is a useless skill. When you disarm the weapon leaves their hand and lands on the ground for anybody to loot. You can only disarm non magic weapons. And monsters hit the same with or without a weapon, within 5 points or so, so I don't really see a point in it.

>>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.25.99 3:13:47 AM >>>
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>


O.K. now that the mystery of Riposte has been solved, what does
disarm do EXACTLY.

It flings the mobs weapon out of its hand?

Is there a limitation, i.e. only non-magic weapons can be disarmed
(if so its a silly skill).

Thanks.
